title: Announcement, Artists Choose Artists: John Dempsey, Georgette Zirbes, Susan Cromwell, Thomas Nuzum, 1991
title_raw: Artists Choose Artists: John Dempsey, Georgette Zirbes, Susan Cromwell, Thomas Nuzum
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, verso, lower center: 1991 DESIGN: EDWARD FELLA fears/ and/ cheers
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper left quadrant, upside down: artists; arunning upward, sideways: choose; right-side up: artists; diagonally across upper right quadrant, running upward: JOHN DEMPSEY/ SUSAN CROWELL; running downward: GEORGETTE ZIRBES/ THOMAS NUZUM; across upper right quadrant: artists, running downward, sideways: choose; upside down: artists; across center: January 11-February 9, 1991; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: ALSO IN THE AREA opening JANUARY 11. THE MARKET PRESENTS/ GEORGE ORTMAN & CONNIE WHIDDEN/ DETROIT ARTISTS MARKET/ UPSTAIRS: DURATOR DESSIS NAWROCKI/ CLIFFORD/ ELEINKO/ GOLDFADDEN; across lower right edge, running downward, sideways: REVIEW COMMITTEE/ CURATORS/ CANN HEGARTY MARTA LAGOS/ ALHINTON/ MIKE MCGILLIS/ SAM MORELLO/ SUSAN STEPHENSON; across lower left quadrant: RECEPTION/ :FRIDAY/ JANUARY 11,/ 5:30-8:30 P.M.; across lower half of sheet, center: DETROIT/ FOCUS GALLERY/ 634 BEAUBIEN 3RD FLOOR/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN 48226/ TELEPHONE: (313) 962-9025/ HOURS: WEDNESDAY/ THRU SAT, NOON TO 6 O'CLOCK   
Verso: Imprinted in black across lower left quadrant: 743 BEAUBIEN 3RD FLOOR/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN/ ACROSS FROM THE BRICKTOWN STATION/ WITH SUPPORT FROM/ THE MICHIGAN COUNCIL FOR THE ARTS/ THE DETROIT COUNCIL OF THE ARTS/ EQUAL OPPORTUNITY ORG./ MEMBER/ OF/ NAAO; across lower right edge, running downward, sideways: NON-PROFIT ORG./ BULK RATE/ U.S. POSTAGE/ PAID/ DETROIT/ MICHIGAN/ PERMIT NO 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black, for exhibition at Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed.  [Printed] hand-lettered text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout. 
Recto: Upper left quadrant, text giving exhibition title in shape of "I."  Upper right quadrant, text giving artists' names arranged in diamond shape, enclosing title text shaped in an "I."  Across lower half of sheet, text giving dates, location, reception, contact, and additional information.    
Verso:  Center, designer's credit, with abstract shape.  Across lower right quadrant, rectangular box with markings, divided by diagonal lines into three unequal parts.  Lower left quadrant, sponsors and return address.  Lower right corner, mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Artists Choose Artists: John Dempsey, Georgette Zirbes, Susan Cromwell, Thomas Nuzum, 1991. Offset lithograph on off-white paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-57
